import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom'; import { useShopping } from './Shopping'; function Sepet() { const { addShopping, items } = useShopping(); const findShopping = items.find((item) => item.id === product.id); return (
{items.map((item) =>
 Back
in {item.category}
{item.title}
Rating {item.rating && item.rating.rate}
${item.price}

{item.description}

)}
) } export default Sepet;
